resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156657</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156657</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2797</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Please Leave a message after the beep.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lassen Sie bitte eine Meldung nach dem Signalton.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Veuillez laisser un message après le bip.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deixe por favor uma mensagem após o beep.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lasci prego un messaggio dopo il colpo.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παρακαλώ αφήστε ένα μήνυμα μετά από το ηχητικό 
σήμα.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Deje por favor un mensaje después de la señal 
acústica.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for an activity where students listen to a recording of messages left on an answering machine write down the relevant information contained in these messages, and also record their own messages. Includes an assessment rubric and some actual examples..</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">messages</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine Aktivität, in der 
Kursteilnehmer zu einer Aufnahme der Meldungen nach links auf einer 
antwortenden Maschine hören, notieren die relevanten Informationen, 
die in diesen Meldungen enthalten werden und speichern auch ihre 
eigenen Meldungen. Schließt eine Einschätzung Rubrik und 
einige tatsächliche Beispiele ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une activité où les étudiants 
écoutent un enregistrement des messages à gauche sur un répondeur 
notent l'information appropriée contenue dans ces messages, et 
enregistrent également leurs propres messages. Inclut une 
rubrique d'évaluation et quelques exemples réels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma atividade onde os 
estudantes escutem uma gravação das mensagens à esquerda em uma 
máquina respondendo escreve para baixo a informação relevante 
contida nestas mensagens, e grava também suas próprias mensagens. 
Inclui um rubric da avaliação e alguns exemplos reais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per un'attività dove gli allievi 
ascoltano una registrazione dei messaggi a sinistra su una macchina di
risposta annota le informazioni relative contenute in questi messaggi 
ed egualmente registra i loro propri messaggi. Include una 
rubrica di valutazione ed alcuni esempi reali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια δραστηριότητα όπου οι 
σπουδαστές ακούνε μια καταγραφή των μηνυμάτων που αφήνονται σε 
έναν αυτόματο τηλεφωνητή γράφει κάτω τις σχετικές πληροφορίες 
που περιλαμβάνονται σε αυτά τα μηνύματα, και καταγράφει επίσης τα
μηνύματά τους. Περιλαμβάνει μια ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης και 
μερικά πραγματικά παραδείγματα ..</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una actividad donde los 
estudiantes escuchan una grabación de mensajes a la izquierda en un 
contestador automático anota la información relevante contenida en 
estos mensajes, y también registra sus propios mensajes. 
Incluye una rúbrica del gravamen y algunos ejemplos reales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">hörendes Erfassen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Meldungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einschätzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension d'écoute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">messages</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évaluation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão escutando</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">mensagens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">avaliação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione ascoltante</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">messaggi</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">valutazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση ακούσματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μηνύματα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αξιολόγηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">comprensión que escucha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">expresión escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">mensajes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gravamen</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
